description: Amazon has launched 27 satellites as part of Project Kuiper, initiating a broadband constellation aimed at challenging SpaceX’s Starlink. Deployed via a ULA Atlas V rocket from Florida, the launch marks the first of over 80 missions planned to establish more than 3,200 satellites in low Earth orbit, offering global internet coverage and advanced satellite connectivity.
title: Amazon Launches 27 Satellites to Start Building Project Kuiper Internet Constellation

description: After a rocket malfunction left two satellites spiralling in the wrong orbit, Chinese engineers turned to gravitational slingshot manoeuvres for a 123-day rescue mission—successfully restoring them and advancing China's ambitions in space autonomy.
title: China Uses Gravitational Slingshots to Rescue Two Satellites Stuck in Orbit for 123 Days

description: SpaceX launched 23 Starlink satellites, including 13 with direct-to-cell capability, aboard a brand-new Falcon 9 rocket from Kennedy Space Centre. Marking its second launch of the day's mission, this was the first flight for this booster and the 50th Falcon 9 launch of the year, further expanding the Starlink megaconstellation in low Earth orbit.
title: SpaceX Launches 23 Starlink Satellites on Falcon 9 Rocket From Cape Canaveral

description: Coinbase, Animoca Brands, Fabric Ventures, and Founders Factory have announced an accelerator initiative in the UK, focused on Web3 projects. Alongside the cash reward, the initiative also offers 16 weeks of industry experience from Founders Factory, a startup accelerator firm based in London, UK.
title: Coinbase, Animoca Brands Announce Web3 Accelerator Initiative in the UK

description: Reddit, the discussion forum-style social media platform, announced the expansion of its automatic translation feature on Monday. In September 2024, the company introduced a machine learning (ML) feature that automatically translates posts and comments on the platform to users’ preferred language. It is now expanding the feature to introduce the Hindi language. Additionally, the artificial intelligence (AI) feature will soon support the Bengali language, the company added.
title: Reddit Expands AI-Powered Translation Feature for Posts and Comments in Hindi

description: Vivo introduced the Pro and standard Y300 handsets in China in September and December 2024, respectively. A few weeks back, the company unveiled the Vivo Y300 Pro+ and the Vivo Y300t variants in the country. The brand is now gearing up to launch a Vivo Y300 GT. Alongside confirming the launch date, the design and key features of the upcoming smartphone have been revealed.
title: Vivo Y300 GT Launch Date Announced; Design, Key Features Revealed Days Ahead of Debut

description: Xiaomi 16 and Xiaomi 16 Pro are almost half a year away from their potential launch. Regardless, details of the phones are appearing on the Web, with a new leak now revealing the key specifications of the entry-level model in the Xiaomi 16 series. The vanilla Xiaomi 16 is claimed to arrive with the largest battery seen on a 6.32-inch display phone. It is said to feature triple rear cameras. The current-generation Xiaomi 15 debuted in India in March.
title: Xiaomi 16 Specifications Leaked; Said to Arrive With 6.3-Inch Display and Large Battery

description: Abu Dhabi’s ADQ sovereign wealth fund, the First Abu Dhabi Bank (FAB), and investment firm IHC have planned to launch a Dirham-backed stablecoin. The token will be supported on the ADI blockchain, developed by an Abu Dhabi-based non-profit firm called the ADI Foundation.
title: Abu Dhabi’s ADQ, FAB and IHC Announce Plans for Dirham-Backed Stablecoin

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 is all set to begin on May 1 at 12pm noon for all users in India. The Prime members will have 12 hours of early access to the sale starting at midnight. During the sale, buyers can find deals on a wide range of consumer tech devices such as smartphones, tablets, smart TVs, smartwatches, home appliances, and more. Amazon has teamed up with HDFC Bank to offer an extra instant discount to its cardholders during the sale.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Top Deals Revealed Ahead of the Sale

description: Amazon is ready to open its Great Summer Sale for 2025 on May 1. During the sale, the customers can get a wide variety of items at reduced prices. Effective prices of select products can be further lowered by availing of additional bank offers and coupon discounts. We have compiled a list of Amazon devices that you can get at lucrative prices ahead of the sale.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Top Upcoming Deals on Amazon Devices

description: Duolingo, the ed-tech platform focused on teaching languages, mathematics, and music, is making a decisive pivot towards becoming an AI-first company. On Monday, the company released an all-hands email from its CEO, Luis von Ahn, which highlighted the company’s vision for the near future. A major focus of this shift would be to phase out the company’s contract workers with artificial intelligence (AI) tools.
title: Duolingo Outlines AI-First Strategy, Plans to Replace Contract Workers With AI Tools

description: ED, which probes economic crimes, has been investigating Amazon and Flipkart for years for allegedly breaching laws by stocking and exerting control over goods they list online. The agency, in recent weeks wrote to smartphone companies, including Apple and Xiaomi, to get data related to their online sales.
title: ED Said to be Quizzing Apple, Xiaomi in E-Commerce Probe on Amazon, Flipkart

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is rumoured to launch in May as the latest addition to the flagship Galaxy S25 lineup. Ahead of its anticipated debut, a new report suggests that the handset may come with the same front camera seen on its elder siblings. Meanwhile in another development, a leaked image sheds light on the placement of various ports on the Galaxy S25 Edge.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge to Debut With Same Front Camera as Other Galaxy S25 Models; Ports Layout Tipped

description: Spotify reported operating profit that missed estimates even as it saw a surge in subscribers in the first quarter. The profit miss overshadowed a stronger gain in subscribers in the first three months of the year, showing that the streaming service’s strategy of expanding beyond music into audiobooks and podcasts is luring more fans even as it raises prices.
title: Spotify Subscribers Grow to 268 Million Even as Streaming Firm Misses Quarterly Estimates

description: OnePlus Nord CE 5, the successor to last year's Nord CE 4, could be launched soon. The handset, yet to be officially announced, has been spotted on the TDRA website. The OnePlus Nord CE 4 was launched in April 2024, featured a Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 SoC and a 5,500mAh battery.
title: OnePlus Nord CE 5 Spotted on TDRA Website; Tipster Claims OnePlus Nord CE 5 Lite Won't Debut

description: OpenAI announced new capabilities for its ChatGPT Search feature on Monday. The San Francisco-based AI firm is adding a new experimental shopping experience to the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot, which will showcase products in a more visual manner and share a direct link to buy. Additionally, the company is also adding several other utility features.
title: OpenAI Upgrades ChatGPT Search With Shopping Feature, Support for Multiple Citation

description: Samsung has reportedly started rolling out the Android 15-based stable One UI 7 update for Galaxy S23 series smartphones. The update is rolling out to users in India and certain global markets. The handsets initially shipped with Android 13 with One UI 5.1 skin on top. The updated user interface comes with improved design, quick access and media features. The smartphones are now equipped with integrated Gemini AI features.
title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Series Reportedly Receiving Stable One UI 7 Update in India

description: Apple was rumoured to use a scratch-resistant anti-reflective display coating on the iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max models this year, but a recent report indicates that this addition has been cancelled due to scaling problems. Current ‌iPhone models feature a fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Display Won't Feature Scratch-Resistant, Anti-Reflective Coating: Report

description: iPhone 17 series is expected to launch in select markets later this year. The lineup may include a base, an Air, a Pro and a Pro Max variant. The company is expected to begin mass production of the iPhone 17 series phones soon, to keep in line with the expected September launch. At least one of the purported handsets has reportedly cleared an important testing phase.
title: iPhone 17 Series Phone Clears Key Testing Milestone Ahead of Mass Production

description: Oppo Find X8 series was announced in October 2024 and the rumour mill is already churning out potential details about its successor. As per a tipster, Oppo may make a change to the camera system of the purported Oppo Find X9 Pro and simplify the design with the inclusion of a higher-resolution sensor. It is said to sport a new 200-megapixel periscope telephoto lens which could replace the dual telephoto unit which the Find X8 Pro currently offers.
title: Oppo Find X9 Pro Tipped to Replace Dual Telephoto Cameras With Single 200-Megapixel Periscope Lens

description: Bromance is the story of Binto and Shinto, played by Mathew and Shyam, respectively, who lead very contrasting lives. It is when, out of nowhere, Shinto goes missing. Binto leaves his social media aside and hunts to find his brother, leading to an unexpected, fun, and chaotic series.
title: Bromance OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Mathew Thomas and Arjun Ashokan Malayalam Film

description: Elden Ring, the groundbreaking action-RPG that released in 2022, has sold 30 million copies, developer FromSoftware announced Monday. The game reached the sales milestone three years after its launch, signalling it was still going strong. Elden Ring is comfortably the highest selling game from the Japanese studio, which is currently working on a spinoff title, Elden Ring Nightreign.
title: Elden Ring Has Sold 30 Million Copies in 3 Years, FromSoftware Announces

description: Google is expanding its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot Gemini to younger users. Last month, the Mountain View-based tech giant announced allowing users younger than the age of 13 years (or the applicable age in the respective country) to access its AI chatbot across Android, iOS, and on the web. The company is also letting parents and school administrators manage and supervise their access to the AI chatbot.
title: Google Preparing to Roll Out Gemini AI for Younger Users With Parental Controls: Report

description: Apple is reportedly breaking up its artificial intelligence (AI) division and relocating two key product operations. As per the report, the Cupertino-based tech giant is currently moving its secretive robotics group to the hardware engineering division, after Siri was moved to the software engineering organisation in March. The process of taking away key projects from the AI division reportedly began in 2021.
title: Apple Reportedly Moves Robotics Team Out of AI Division Ahead of Anticipated Restructuring

description: Apple Vision Air will likely arrive in markets soon. A recent report suggested the expected launch timeline of the purported mixed reality headset. It is tipped to be a thinner and lighter counterpart of the existing Apple Vision Pro headset. The rumoured Air-branded AR/VR wearable is expected to be a cheaper alternative to the existing version.
title: Apple Vision Air Launch Timeline Leaked; Could Be Thinner and Lighter Than the Apple Vision Pro

description: Dimensity 9500 SoC is rumoured to be in development as the latest flagship-tier smartphone processor from MediaTek. Ahead of its anticipated debut sometime later this year, a tipster suggests that it could be fabricated using TSMC's N3P process (3nm). Powered by Arm’s latest Cortex-X9 series cores, the chipset is speculated to bring improvements related to ray tracing and artificial intelligence (AI), the latter supported by a neural processing unit (NPU) capable of delivering 100 tera operations per second (TOPS) performance.
title: MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC Tipped to Offer Improved Ray Tracing and AI Performance; Specifications Leak

description: WhatsApp launched emoji reactions on the platform long ago, which lets users express their feelings toward a message with six different emojis. Now, the Meta-owned instant messaging service appears to be taking a step ahead with message reactions to express yourself with stickers. WhatsApp is reportedly adding sticker reactions for messages and media files on its Android app. The feature has been spotted in WhatsApp for Android beta Android 2.25.13.23 update, which is available via the Google Play Beta programme.
title: WhatsApp Begins Testing Sticker Reactions for Messages and Media
Airtel Payments Bank: The Smartest Way to Invest in Digital Gold

description: Google on Monday announced a new event dedicated to Android updates set for broadcast a week before I/O 2025, its annual developer conference, kicks off. Dubbed The Android Show: I/O Edition, the new series will play host to several announcements related to the next iteration of the Android operating system (OS) — Android 16.
title: Google to Host Dedicated 'Android Show' Ahead of I/O 2025 Developer Conference Next Month

description: iQOO has unveiled the Z10 Turbo Pro and the Z10 Turbo handsets in China. They are equipped with 50-megapixel dual rear camera units alongside 16-megapixel selfie shooters. The phones carry dedicated Q1 gaming chips and support up to 144Hz displays. The base iQOO Z10 Turbo series model has a MediaTek Dimensity 8400 SoC, while the Z10 Turbo Pro variant carries a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset.
title: iQOO Z10 Turbo Pro With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC Launched Alongside iQOO Z10 Turbo: Price, Specifications

description: Mastercard has announced it will launch a  a payment ecosystem allowing buyers and merchants to facilitate stablecoins transactions. In an official announcement released on April 28, Mastercard claimed that this system would be effective globally, covering over 150 million merchant locations.
title: Mastercard Partners OKX, Nuvei to Launch Payment Ecosystem for Stablecoins

description: NASA captured a rare stellar occultation of Uranus this month, providing fresh data about the ice giant’s atmosphere and rings. Scientists measured temperature changes and atmospheric composition, offering new insights since the last major occultation in 1996. The findings could help guide future exploration missions and deepen our understanding of Uranus' complex environment.
title: NASA Observes Rare Uranus Occultation, Unveiling New Atmospheric and Ring Details

description: Apple is anticipated to come with a significant redesign for the 20th-anniversary edition of its iPhone lineup, which is expected to launch in September 2027. The Cupertino-based company will likely launch a unique flagship Pro device alongside a foldable iPhone. Now, Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman states that Apple won’t be able to manufacture its first foldable iPhone and the 20th anniversary iPhone in India.
title: Apple’s 20th Anniversary iPhone, Foldable iPhone Will Be Manufactured in China: Mark Gurman

description: Gadgets 360 got a chance to sit with Nothing CEO Carl Pei to talk about new phones, the Indian smartphone market, innovation challenges, and future plans. Pei spoke about the AI hype and how he wants to ban the use of the word "AI" in the company. He also talked about the young user base and the bold smartphone market strategy for a market like India. Read our full interview here.
title: Carl Pei on How Nothing and CMF Are Betting Big on India’s Youth, Beyond AI Hype, and Bold Smartphone Market Strategy

description: Criminal Code Season 2, the most awaited show, will premiere on Netflix on June 4, 2025. The series features Maeve Jinkings & Rômulo Braga in the lead roles as federal officers facing new challenges. The Issac's Ghost Gang is now more powerful and dangerous. Suellen has to prove her leadership skills while Benicio struggles with personal loss
title: Criminal Code Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Brazilian Crime Series Online?

description: One of the most awaited anime series is back with its season 2. Dan Da Dan will take the viewers on the journey of Momo and Okarun, where they are set to fight the supernatural entities. The teaser has shared a glimpse of Jiji transforming into his evil eye form for the first time. Watch Dan Da Dan Season 2 from 3rd July 2025, only on Netflix.
title: Dan Da Dan Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: iQOO has unveiled the Z10 Turbo Pro and the Z10 Turbo handsets in China. They are equipped with 50-megapixel dual rear camera units alongside 16-megapixel selfie shooters. The phones carry dedicated Q1 gaming chips and support up to 144Hz displays. The base iQOO Z10 Turbo series model has a MediaTek Dimensity 8400 SoC, while the Z10 Turbo Pro variant carries a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset.
title: iQOO Z10 Turbo Pro With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC Launched Alongside iQOO Z10 Turbo: Price, Specifications

description: iQOO’s Z10x appears to be a proper contender for the budget smartphone segment. It’s equipped with one of the biggest batteries in its class and it’s all packaged in a design that appears slimmer than its predecessor. iQOO’s even gone with an updated processor that’s best in class. However, all is not what it seems like on paper as we discovered in our review.
title: iQOO Z10x Review: A Big Battery Budget Smartphone

description: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 series is rumoured to be in development as the successor to the Galaxy Watch 7 lineup. Ahead of its anticipated debut later this year, it has reportedly been spotted on a certification site that hints towards Samsung bringing back its popular Galaxy Watch Classic model.
title: Samsung Reportedly Bringing Back Its ‘Classic’ Watch Model With Galaxy Watch 8 Series
Slim Outside. Power Inside. vivo launches T4 5G with India’s biggest 7300mAh Battery

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 was announced last week and it kicks off on May 1 for users in India. If you’ve planning to upgrade your handset or buy one for your loved ones, there’s great news for you since Amazon has revealed several great deals on phones from top brands like Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, and more, which will go live during the Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale Starts May 1: Here Are the Top Smartphone Deals
